changes.text: Added help pages for each of the scripts with -h or --help arguments
Added version information to the agent logs and Info.plist
Fixed a potential file lock issue with FFplay and animethemes.py
Added error clarification for invalid collection names when running collection-posters.py
Fixed the collection-posters.py script not fully functioning on Linux
Changed all script shebangs from python to python3
Added a "play" argument to animethemes.py for playback of anime OP/ED without generating a Theme.mp3
Added updating of the original title field for all series when running forced-metadata.py
Added a new script: rescan-recent.py
Removed forced grouping removal for all files as it stopped the scanner's progress indicator from functioning during a full scan
Added a warning in the readme describing the circumstances in which Plex will group files together
Increased scanner log file size and rotation count
Disabled Plex scanner grouping to remove any chance of unwanted folder grouping or file mergers
Added Shoko to Plex watched state syncing to watched-sync.py
Added a social media preview and readme header logo
Added Shoko's preferred title as an option for episode titles and as the initial fallback
Added Volume (number) to the final episode title fallback and excluded Episode/Volume 0
Added an external configuration file for the automation scripts
Added optional X-Plex-Token authentication method for the automation scripts
Removed the internal configuration options for each automation script
Fixes an issue where Linux based Plex setups could potentially see extraneous errors spammed in the log file
Adds better compatibility to the four automation scripts when running them on a Linux based system
Adds some additional error handling to animethemes.py
